title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.4 - Superintendents of correctional facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.4 - Superintendents of correctional facilities

State Regulations

This section shall apply to each superintendent of a
correctional facility appointed on or after August 9, 1975, and any
superintendent theretofore appointed who elected to be covered by the
provisions thereof by filing such election with the Commissioner of

Correctional Services. (a) Effective

July 1, 1980, the salary schedule for such superintendents shall be as follows: Hiring rate

Job rate
$37,985
$49,473
(b) Effective January 1, 1981, the salary schedule for such superintendents shall
be as follows: Hiring rate

Job rate
$39,270
$51,146

Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
152.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
